content: paul s neary of needle & skein may be finished measurements purchased on ravelry by following this link ravelry com/patterns/library/melt-the-ice-hat wear and enjoy 😊 all proceeds from the sale of that pattern go to the immigrant aid agencies who will distribute the funds to those impacted by the actions of ice i am releasing my own pattern free of charge for those who prefer this shape/fit but please share photos of y our projects consider purchasing the original pattern to and don t forget to tag me support this cause even if you knit my free @annarella makes version thanks ♥ - ax 4 ©2026 annarella | web annarella co uk | ig & fb @annarella makes | ravelry annarella | email hello@annarella co uk abbreviations a-z the small print all annarella patterns are provided on an as-is basis for your personal beg=beginning bor=beg of round co=cast on non-commercial use i do not have a pool of test knitters and am only decrease/ d=decrease/d dpn s =double pointed human therefore although i have tried to be as accurate as possible this pattern may contain errors for which annarella shall accept no needle s increase/d=increase/d k=knit k2tog=knit 2 responsibility should you spot any errors please let me know do share sts together p=purl pm=place marker this pattern but please leave the copyright notice in place you may not sell annarella patterns or use them for commercial purposes without my round s =round s sl=slip st s =stitch es prior written permission for enquiries please visit my website wyf=with yarn in front wyb=with yarn in back annarella co uk or find me on ravelry under the username annarella thanks for your co-operation & spread the love ♥ more abbreviations and links to tutorials including how to make a yarn tassel at annarella co uk/resources 5 ©2026 annarella | web annarella co uk | ig & fb @annarella makes | ravelry annarella | email hello@annarella co uk
